name: Reckless Raider
description:
No time for caution, nor worry, nor fear. It's time to raid!

Hold Space to charge an attack. A fully charged attack releases a blast of magical might! Break open crates to grab loot!

Criteria:
Endless Runner – Procedurally generated dungeon runs endlessly on
Fantasy – Mystical sword which releases a burst of magic

Devil May Care – Rushing head-first into perilous pits

Epic Music – A background filled with clearly epic music

Code: sennoma

Graphics: rdb

Sound effects, music, font open-licensed from third-parties
